title: Asteroids
description: A classic Asteroids game built in C using abstract data types to simulate object-oriented programming, featuring linked lists and SDL2 for graphics.

title: META Front-End Capstone
description: A full-featured restaurant website developed with React, allowing users to order food and make table reservations as part of a capstone project.

title: Deep Learning Training
description: A series of Python exercises and experiments exploring deep learning concepts such as linear regression, softmax, MLNP, and CUDA programming.
